snippet: The assault comes after the killings of two foreigners in the country last week, for which the Islamic State claimed responsibility.
abstract: Police say Rev Luke Sarker, Baptist pastor in Bangladesh, is wounded in knife attack by three men at his home.
lead_paragraph: The assault comes after the killings of two foreigners in the country last week, for which the Islamic State claimed responsibility.

headline.main: Baptist Pastor in Bangladesh Survives Knife Attack
headline.print_headline: Baptist Pastor in Bangladesh Is Wounded in Knife Attack

keywords.name: organizations
